markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=5226) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You can attempt to Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you, or up to three sizes larger than you if you’re legendary in Athletics.
name: Titan Wrestler
